attributes.action: Formula One back on the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
Making formula one viewable on the BBC is one of the reasons why we pay a subscription fee / tax. No consultation has been made with the "customer" and now as a result of paying TV license the public now also have to pay subscription to watch what has always been a free to veiw sport!

Protect sport in the UK Protect the rights of the TAX payer and make F1 available to all!
